remarks: Two expressions for the 1-dimensional subspaces of partial vector space A. Remark in [Crawley] p. 120 line 21, but using a non-identity translation (nonzero vector) ` F ` whose trace is ` P ` rather than ` P ` itself; ` F ` exists by ~ cdlemf . ` E ` is the division ring base by ~ erngdv , and ` s `` F ` is the scalar product by ~ dvavsca . ` F ` must be a non-identity translation for the expression to be a 1-dimensional subspace, although the theorem doesn't require it. (Contributed by NM, 14-Oct-2013.)

dva1dim.r $e |- R = ( ( trL ` K ) ` W ) $.
dva1dim.e $e |- E = ( ( TEndo ` K ) ` W ) $.
dva1dim $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ F e. T ) -> { g | E. s e. E g = ( s ` F ) } = { g e. T | ( R ` g ) .<_ ( R ` F ) } ) $.
